channel.title: Most complete source or npc server?
channel.description: I was wondering if anyone knew of a source that was nearly complete. even better anyone know of a good npc source. I notice that everyone tends to make the servers more towards pvp but I have been searching for a nice npc server to use as my base.

item.title: Most complete source or npc server?
item.dc:creator: @ViciousBond ViciousBond
item.description:
@ViciousBond wrote:

[quote=“Ashley, post:4, topic:466027”][quote author=RandQm link=topic=573802.msg4144355#msg4144355 date=1352136965]
dafuq is an npc server
[/quote]Nuclear Powered Scape.[/quote]

That made me lmfao, but yeah dude i dont think there is a server where your just gonna have PvM cause people will always wanna PK

Read full topic
item.source: Most complete source or npc server?

item.title: Most complete source or npc server?
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

boxer15:

I was wondering if anyone knew of a source that was nearly complete. even better anyone know of a good npc source. I notice that everyone tends to make the servers more towards pvp but I have been searching for a nice npc server to use as my base.

Thing’s are not handed to people, if you want a good server you will have to learn how to program and make it a good server, What you should be looking for is a base, I’d suggest heading over to the download section and looking around and finding something you like, everyone has a different taste in what they like and don’t like so you must make this decision alone young one.

Lmao, last part made me laugh a bit

Read full topic

item.title: Most complete source or npc server?
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

Never knew there was such a thing as a, “NPC Server.” But alright, go to the downloads section, click on one of the source links and look at the images. If it’s a good source, it’ll usually list what it has included in it.

Read full topic
